hero.title: A Sock-tacular Bedtime Adventure
hero.description: Meet Earl: the happiest monster in the entire universe. Earl is so happy because he wears the most snuggly, stretchy, fluffy, fuzzy, cuddly, cozy socks ever!

features.title: Magical Sock Trees
features.description: Visit Earl in the faraway forest where he plucks fresh socks off the sock trees

features.title: Sparkle Fizz
features.description: Learn how Earl machine-hand-washes his socks to keep them smelling like roses

features.title: Sock Storage
features.description: Go downstairs and see tall stacks of sardine tins where Earl stores his socks.

cta.text: Step into Earl's world where every day ends just right!
